links.title: Apple Nesting Higher As Elliott Wave Impulse Structure
links.description: Apple ticker symbol: $AAPL short-term Elliott wave view suggests that the decline to $215.31 low ended intermediate wave (4) pullback. Above from there, the stock is nesting higher within wave intermediate wave (5) looking for more upside extension. The internals of intermediate wave (5) is unfolding as impulse structure with the sub-division of 5 waves rally in each leg higher.

source.name: Elliott Wave Forecast : Analysis and Trading Signals

message.body: $AAPL just said that #Bloomberg is a liar. Well, I concur. https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2018/10/what-businessweek-got-wrong-about-apple/

links.title: What Businessweek got wrong about Apple
links.description: Over the course of the past year, Bloomberg has contacted us multiple times with claims, sometimes vague and sometimes elaborate, of an alleged security incident at Apple. Each time, we have conducted rigorous internal investigations based on their inquiries and each time we have found absolutely no evidence to support any of them.

links.title: While the ride was scary, did anything change today?
links.description: Free After-Hours Update Thursday was brutal for the S&P 500. Ten-year Treasury yields surged to the highest levels since 2011 and fear of sharply rising interest rates sent global equity investors scrambling for cover.

messages.body: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: $SNAP, $TSLA, $AAPL, $FB & more    https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/05/stocks-making-the-biggest-moves-premarket-snap-tsla-aapl-fb--more.html

links.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: SNAP, TSLA, AAPL, FB & more
links.description: Snap - CEO Evan Spiegel told employees the company is focused on achieving profitability in 2019, according to a memo sent to employees seen by CNBC. The memo also outlined other problems with the company's app and apologized for its redesign, which Spiegel said was "rushed."
